content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate our conversation, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. Now, please share your proposed rental price. 

For this simulation, assume that you want to agree with a price of 1150 Euros per month, following the given rules.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would like to offer 1000 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my desired price significantly exceeds the offered amount.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1100 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I counter your offer with 1150 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
